Privacy policy of Migu Company

We pay great attention to protecting the personal information and privacy of users ("you"), and hope to simply introduce you how we collect, use and protect your personal information through the summary.
The general summary is the attachment of "Migu Privacy Policy". If you want to understand our detailed privacy policy, please check the text of the privacy policy after the summary.
First, how do we collect and use your personal information.
1.1 Personal information

(1) When you register and log in to the "Migu Video" service, you can use it, the "one -click login" function, by authorizing us to collect and verify your mobile phone number, facilitate us to provide you with a fast login service.

Important
First Party Collection Information

This policy is applicable to the services provided by Migu's Midu product. Please read and understand this "Privacy Policy" before using Migu products.
Part 1: Definition and noun explanation

Migu Company: Migu Culture Technology Co., Ltd. and its five subsidiaries Migu Music Co., Ltd., Migu Video Technology Co., Ltd., Migu Digital Media Co., Ltd., Migu Interactive Entertainment Co., Ltd. and Migu Anime Co., Ltd.

Migu Music Co., Ltd. operates "Migu Music" and "Migu Love Singing" APP. The registered address is: China (Sichuan) Free Trade Pilot Zone Chengdu High -tech Zone Jiaozi Avenue No. 575 Zhonghai International Center No. 1 floor 103, 103, 103, and 103,No. 104 and Block J 3-10 floors;

label: Contact Information

label: Contact Information

text: Migu Interactive Entertainment Co., Ltd. operates "Migu Tour" and "Migu Shan Run" (including TV -side 'Migu Fitness') APP.9, 10, 11 floors, 3 floors of Building 5, Building 6, 3, 3, 4, and 5;
label: Contact Information

text: Migu Animation Co., Ltd. operates the "Migu Circle" APP. The registered address is: No. 1133, Jimei Avenue, Jimei District, Xiamen.
label: Contact Information

text: Migu products: Migu Midu Music Music, Migu Love, Migu Video, "Mobile Cloud VR", Migu Reading, Migu Run, Migu Circle, Mimu Circle, Mimu CircleGurun Bookstore, 5G Mercy Website or Mobile Application Software.

Personal information: A variety of information that can be recorded in electronics or other ways to identify specific natural persons or reflects the activity of specific natural persons with other information.

Personal information includes name, date of birth, ID number, personal biometric information, address, communication and communication contact information, communication records and content, account passwords, property information, credit information, trading information, trading information.

Personal sensitive information: Once leaked, illegally provided or abuses the security of people and property, it is easy to lead to personal information that is treated with personal reputation, physical and mental health or discrimination.

Personal sensitive information includes identity documents, personal biometric information, bank accounts, communication records and content, property information, credit information, trajectory trajectory, accommodation information, health and physiological information, transaction information, individuals under 14 years old (inclusive).information.
The only device identifier: refers to a string of characters compiled by the equipment manufacturer into the device, which can be used to identify the corresponding equipment in a unique way.

Specifically include: international mobile device recognition code (IMEI), anonymous device identifier (OAID), Android ID, iOS advertising identifier (IDFA), network card (MAC) address, international mobile user identification code (IMSI), OpenUDID, GUIDEssence

User portrait: By collecting, converging, and analyzing personal information, the personal characteristics of a specific natural person, such as their occupations, economy, health, education, personal preferences, credit, and behavior in terms of analysis or prediction, forming their personal characteristics models.
Use personal information of specific natural persons to form a characteristic model of the natural person, called direct user portraits.
The use of personal information from specific natural persons, such as the data of its group, forms a characteristic model of the natural person, called indirect user portraits.
Devision: Through the technical processing of personal information, the process of personal information cannot be recognized, and the processing information after processing cannot be restored.
The information obtained after the identification processing of personal information is not personal information.

text: 3. How do we use cookies and similar technologies
(1) Cookie

text: (2) Website beacon and pixel label
In addition to Cookie, we may also use the website's beacon and pixel labels other similar technologies.
The email we send to you may contain a link to the URL of the content of our website.
If you click the link, we will track this click to help us understand your product or service preferences and improve customer service.
label: Important
Risk
rewrite: If you click the link, we will track this click to help us understand your product or service preferences and improve customer service.

text: Website beacon is usually a transparent image embedded in a website or email.
With the pixel labels in emails, we can know whether the email has been opened.
If you don't want your activities to be tracked in this way, you can withdraw from our signal list at any time.
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: If you don't want your activities to be tracked in this way, you can withdraw from our signal list at any time.

text: (3) Do Not Track (Do not track)
Many network browsers have the Do not track function, which can release the DO Not Track request to the website.
At present, the major Internet standard organization has not yet established relevant policies to stipulate how websites should respond to such requests.
label: Important
Risk
rewrite: The main Internet standard organization has not yet established relevant policies to stipulate how websites should respond to such requests.

text: But if your browser is enabled, do, not, track, then all our websites will respect your choices.

Edit/Control
